pal.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: We’ve been pals since we were at school.
an old pal  (=a friend you have had for a long time)
pal.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: used to speak to a man in an unfriendly way
pal.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: Look, pal, I don’t want you hanging around.
